tool_description: Sorts a list of citations according to specified criteria like alphabetical order, chronological order, or custom sorting rules.

sort_criteria.description: Sorting method: alphabetical_author, alphabetical_title, chronological_asc, chronological_desc, reverse_chronological

secondary_sort.description: Secondary sorting criteria if primary produces ties

error_messages: Insufficient citations: Provide at least 2 citations for sorting.
Too many citations: Maximum 1000 citations allowed for sorting.
Invalid sort criteria: Use one of [alphabetical_author, alphabetical_title, chronological_asc, chronological_desc, reverse_chronological].
Invalid secondary sort: Use one of [alphabetical_author, alphabetical_title, chronological_asc, chronological_desc].
usage: Provide citations array and sort_criteria. Optionally specify secondary_sort for handling ties in primary sorting.

sorted_citations.description: Citations sorted according to specified criteria

secondary_sort_applied.description: Secondary sorting method used for ties
